title: George Stephanopoulos | Unbelieva-Bull
description:
Stephen reacts to the news of a billion dollar judgment against Alex Jones, catches up on the latest stump speech from Senate candidate Herschel Walker, and looks in on Mark Zuckerberg’s plan to save the metaverse. And “Good Morning America” anchor George Stephanopoulos shares his unfiltered thoughts on the former president and what he expects to learn from the next public hearing of the Jan 6 Committee. Check out his new Hulu series, “Power Trip.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
